abstract: Miloš Krasić (Serbian Cyrillic: Милош Красић; born 1 November 1984) is a Serbian professional football winger who plays for Bastia and the Serbian national team. He represented Serbia at the 2010 FIFA World Cup. At one point in his career he was named by FourFourTwo as one of the 100 best players in the world.
